verses.verse: Then <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H3201>couldn't<s%> <S%H662>control<s%> himself before all those who <S%H5324>stood<s%> before <S%H7121>him,<s%> and he cried, <S%H3318>"Cause<s%> <S%H376>everyone<s%> to go <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H376>me!<s%>" No one else <S%H5975>stood<s%> with <S%H3130>him,<s%> while Joseph made himself <S%H3045>known<s%> to his <S%H251>brothers.<s%>
He <S%H6963>wept<s%> <S%H5414>aloud.<s%> The <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H1004>heard,<s%> and the house of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H8085>heard.<s%>

<S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> "I am <S%H3130>Joseph!<s%> Does my <S%H1>father<s%> still <S%H2416>live?<s%>" His <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H3201>couldn't<s%> <S%H6030>answer<s%> <S%H926>him;<s%> for they were terrified at his <S%H6440>presence.<s%>

<S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> "Come <S%H5066>near<s%> to <S%H5066>me,<s%> please." They came near. "He <S%H559>said,<s%> I am <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> your <S%H251>brother,<s%> whom you <S%H4376>sold<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

Now <S%H6087>don't<s%> be grieved, nor <S%H2734>angry<s%> with <S%H5869>yourselves,<s%> that you <S%H4376>sold<s%> me <S%H430>here,<s%> for God <S%H7971>sent<s%> me before <S%H6440>you<s%> to preserve <S%H4241>life.<s%>

For these two <S%H8141>years<s%> the <S%H7458>famine<s%> has been <S%H7130>in<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> and there are yet <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> in which there will be <S%H369>neither<s%> <S%H2758>plowing<s%> nor <S%H7105>harvest.<s%>

<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> me before <S%H6440>you<s%> to <S%H7760>preserve<s%> for <S%H6440>you<s%> a remnant in the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and to save you <S%H2421>alive<s%> by a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6413>deliverance.<s%>

So now it <S%H7971>wasn't<s%> you who sent me <S%H430>here,<s%> but God, and he has <S%H7760>made<s%> me a <S%H1>father<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> <S%H113>lord<s%> of all his <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H4910>ruler<s%> over all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

<S%H4116>Hurry,<s%> and go <S%H5927>up<s%> to my <S%H1>father,<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H1121>him,<s%> 'This is what your son <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>says,<s%> <S%H430>"God<s%> has <S%H7760>made<s%> me <S%H113>lord<s%> of all <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%> Come <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H5975>me.<s%> Don't wait.

You shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1657>Goshen,<s%> and you will be <S%H7138>near<s%> to <S%H1121>me,<s%> you, your children, your <S%H1121>children<s%>'s <S%H1121>children,<s%> your <S%H6629>flocks,<s%> your <S%H1241>herds,<s%> and all that you have.

There I will <S%H3557>nourish<s%> <S%H2568>you;<s%> for there are yet five <S%H8141>years<s%> of <S%H7458>famine;<s%> lest you come to <S%H3423>poverty,<s%> <S%H1004>you,<s%> and your household, and all that you have."'
<S%H5869>Behold,<s%> your eyes <S%H7200>see,<s%> and the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of my <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> that it is my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> that speaks to <S%H1696>you.<s%>

You shall <S%H5046>tell<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> of all my <S%H3519>glory<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and of all that you have <S%H7200>seen.<s%> You shall <S%H4116>hurry<s%> and bring my <S%H1>father<s%> down <S%H3381>here.<s%>"
He <S%H5307>fell<s%> on his <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>'s <S%H6677>neck,<s%> and <S%H1058>wept,<s%> and <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> <S%H1058>wept<s%> on his <S%H6677>neck.<s%>
He <S%H5401>kissed<s%> all his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and <S%H1058>wept<s%> on <S%H310>them.<s%> After that his <S%H251>brothers<s%> talked with <S%H1696>him.<s%>

The <S%H6963>report<s%> of it was <S%H8085>heard<s%> in <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3130>"Joseph<s%>'s <S%H251>brothers<s%> have <S%H935>come.<s%>" It <S%H5869>pleased<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H3190>well,<s%> <S%H5869>and<s%> his <S%H5650>servants.<s%>

<S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> <S%H559>"Tell<s%> your <S%H251>brothers,<s%> <S%H6213><s%> 'Do <S%H2943>this.<s%> Load your <S%H1165>animals,<s%> and <S%H3212>go,<s%> <S%H935>travel<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan.<s%>

<S%H3947>Take<s%> your <S%H1>father<s%> and your <S%H1004>households,<s%> and <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H5414>me,<s%> and I will give you the <S%H2898>good<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and you will <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%>'

Now you are <S%H6680>commanded:<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3947>this.<s%> Take <S%H5699>wagons<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> for your little <S%H2945>ones,<s%> and for your <S%H802>wives,<s%> and <S%H5375>bring<s%> your <S%H1>father,<s%> and <S%H935>come.<s%>
<S%H5869>Also,<s%> <S%H2347>don't<s%> concern yourselves about your <S%H3627>belongings,<s%> for the <S%H2898>good<s%> of all of the <S%H776>land<s%> of Egypt is <S%H4714>yours.<s%>"

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3130>so.<s%> Joseph <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H5699>wagons,<s%> according to the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H6720>provision<s%> for the <S%H1870>way.<s%>

He <S%H5414>gave<s%> each one of <S%H376>them<s%> <S%H2487>changes<s%> of <S%H8071>clothing,<s%> but to <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> he <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> pieces of <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H2487>changes<s%> of <S%H8071>clothing.<s%>

He <S%H7971>sent<s%> the <S%H2063>following<s%> to his <S%H1>father:<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H860>donkeys<s%> <S%H5375>loaded<s%> with the good <S%H2898>things<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H6235>ten<s%> female <S%H2543>donkeys<s%> <S%H5375>loaded<s%> with <S%H1250>grain<s%> and <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H4202>provision<s%> for his <S%H1>father<s%> by the <S%H1870>way.<s%>
So he <S%H7971>sent<s%> his <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H7971>away,<s%> and they <S%H3212>departed.<s%> He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7264>them,<s%> "See that you don't quarrel on the <S%H1870>way.<s%>"
They went <S%H5927>up<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> their <S%H1>father.<s%>

They <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H559>him,<s%> saying, <S%H3130>"Joseph<s%> is still <S%H2416>alive,<s%> and he is <S%H4910>ruler<s%> over all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>" His <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H6313>fainted,<s%> for he <S%H539>didn't<s%> believe them.

They <S%H1696>told<s%> him all the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> which he had <S%H1696>said<s%> to <S%H7200>them.<s%> When he saw the <S%H5699>wagons<s%> which <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> had <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H5375>carry<s%> <S%H7307>him,<s%> the spirit of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> their <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H2421>revived.<s%>

<S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "It is <S%H7227>enough.<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> my <S%H1121>son<s%> is still <S%H2416>alive.<s%> I will <S%H3212>go<s%> and see <S%H7200>him<s%> before I <S%H4191>die.<s%>"
